monster.name: Beast of the Cave (HB)

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 5 + five times your ranger level (the beast has a number of Hit Dice [d8s] equal to your ranger level)

trait.name: Primal Bond
trait.text: You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes.

trait.name: Tremmorsense
trait.text: The Beast knows the location of anything in contact with the ground within 30 feet.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 + PB piercing or slashing damage (your choice).

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's Ranger Archetypes v.3.0.0 p. 12 (Homebrew)
